name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: This records identifiers associated with this family member history record that are defined by business processes and/ or used to refer to it when a direct URL reference to the resource itself is not appropriate (e.g. in CDA documents, or in written / printed documentation).

name: $addidentifier
desc: This records identifiers associated with this family member history record that are defined by business processes and/ or used to refer to it when a direct URL reference to the resource itself is not appropriate (e.g. in CDA documents, or in written / printed documentation).

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: This records identifiers associated with this family member history record that are defined by business processes and/ or used to refer to it when a direct URL reference to the resource itself is not appropriate (e.g. in CDA documents, or in written / pri

name: $definition
desc: Returns: A protocol or questionnaire that was adhered to in whole or in part by this event.

name: $adddefinition
desc: A protocol or questionnaire that was adhered to in whole or in part by this event.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A protocol or questionnaire that was adhered to in whole or in part by this event.

name: $status
desc: Returns: A code specifying the status of the record of the family history of a specific family member.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A code specifying the status of the record of the family history of a specific family member.

name: $notDone
desc: Returns: If true, indicates the taking of an individual family member's history did not occur. The notDone element should not be used to document negated conditions, such as a family member that did not have a condition.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: If true, indicates the taking of an individual family member's history did not occur. The notDone element should not be used to document negated conditions, such as a family member that did not have a condition.

name: $notDoneReason
desc: Returns: Describes why the family member's history is absent.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Describes why the family member's history is absent.

name: $patient
desc: Returns: The person who this history concerns.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The person who this history concerns.

name: $date
desc: Returns: The date (and possibly time) when the family member history was taken.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The date (and possibly time) when the family member history was taken.

name: $::name
desc: Returns: This will either be a name or a description; e.g. "Aunt Susan", "my cousin with the red hair".

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: This will either be a name or a description; e.g. "Aunt Susan", "my cousin with the red hair".

name: $relationship
desc: Returns: The type of relationship this person has to the patient (father, mother, brother etc.).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The type of relationship this person has to the patient (father, mother, brother etc.).

name: $gender
desc: Returns: Administrative Gender - the gender that the relative is considered to have for administration and record keeping purposes.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Administrative Gender - the gender that the relative is considered to have for administration and record keeping purposes.

name: $estimatedAge
desc: Returns: If true, indicates that the age value specified is an estimated value.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: If true, indicates that the age value specified is an estimated value.

name: $reasonCode
desc: Returns: Describes why the family member history occurred in coded or textual form.

name: $addreasonCode
desc: Describes why the family member history occurred in coded or textual form.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Describes why the family member history occurred in coded or textual form.

name: $reasonReference
desc: Returns: Indicates a Condition, Observation, AllergyIntolerance, or QuestionnaireResponse that justifies this family member history event.

name: $addreasonReference
desc: Indicates a Condition, Observation, AllergyIntolerance, or QuestionnaireResponse that justifies this family member history event.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Indicates a Condition, Observation, AllergyIntolerance, or QuestionnaireResponse that justifies this family member history event.

name: $note
desc: Returns: This property allows a non condition-specific note to the made about the related person. Ideally, the note would be in the condition property, but this is not always possible.

name: $addnote
desc: This property allows a non condition-specific note to the made about the related person. Ideally, the note would be in the condition property, but this is not always possible.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: This property allows a non condition-specific note to the made about the related person. Ideally, the note would be in the condition property, but this is not always possible.

name: $condition
desc: Returns: The significant Conditions (or condition) that the family member had. This is a repeating section to allow a system to represent more than one condition per resource, though there is nothing stopping multiple resources - one per condition.

name: $addcondition
desc: The significant Conditions (or condition) that the family member had. This is a repeating section to allow a system to represent more than one condition per resource, though there is nothing stopping multiple resources - one per condition.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The significant Conditions (or condition) that the family member had. This is a repeating section to allow a system to represent more than one condition per resource, though there is nothing stopping multiple resources - one per condition.
